page.title: 20Anstruther Future Hopes
page.content:
Here are our hopes for the future.
1 There will be jobs for us when we leave school 2 There will be a leisure centre built in Anstruther so that we can play sports like ice-hockey 3 The world's ships, cars, motor bikes & other vehicles would never have accidents 4 There will be nuclear disarmament 5 There will be an end to violence 6 There will be everlasting peace.
The information was prepared by - {Steven Aitken Marie Allardyce {Jamie Dumbreck Gareth Heeley {Nicola Leese Euan O'Brien {William Spratt John Wood { }and {Mr Orr Smith Mr Charles Small
